Articles.Content:
Making a rework of my old SR-71, using ALOT less parts (217 as of now without struts, vs the 1000+ my old sr-71 has) and focusing on flight performance. As of now the design is mostly finished, with only the tail boom missing and some minor details that are needed, it's probably going to be finished soon.

Landing gear will eventually be replaced to some black ones, and struts will be placed to not make it wiggle around.
